Reason: The configuration option 'commitlog_segment_size_in_mb' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'commitLogSegmentSize' configuration directly affects the performance of the system at the system level. The 'commitLogSegmentSize' is used in various code snippets such as creating buffer pools, writing data to disk, and managing commit log segments. These operations are time-expensive and memory-expensive, and the size of the commit log segment directly impacts the performance of these operations. Therefore, any changes to the 'commitlog_segment_size_in_mb' configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
